title: DUB inhibitors market set for strong expansion through 2040
summary: The DUB (deubiquitinase) inhibitors market is expected to expand significantly across the seven major markets (7MM)—the United States, EU4 (Germany, France, Italy, Spain), the United Kingdom and Japan—through 2040, driven by the launch of novel therapeutic candidates targeting protein homeostasis pathways and led by firms such as InSilico Medicine, according to a new market report. […] The post DUB inhibitors market set for strong expansion through 2040 appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
